smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onResume is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function get_remaining_hard is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function set_from_cursor is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function build_ContentValues is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class Settings is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class View_data is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class Data is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onCreate appears to be too complex.
The function onResume appears to be too complex.
The function on_separate_time_butt appears to be too complex.
The function on_checkbox_dialog_ok appears to be too complex.
The function onReceive appears to be too complex.
The function get_remaining_easy appears to be too complex.
The function get_remaining_hard appears to be too complex.
The function format_text appears to be too complex.
The function update_display appears to be too complex.
The function apply_repeat appears to be too complex.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'Settings' with '30' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'Progress_bars' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'Adapter' with '21' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function onSharedPreferenceChanged is nested too deeply.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function format_text has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: SimpleDateFormat.getDateInstance() cannot be safely cast to SimpleDateFormat.
SimpleDateFormat.getTimeInstance() cannot be safely cast to SimpleDateFormat.
binding.toolbar cannot be safely cast to Toolbar.
intent.getSerializableExtra(EXTRA_EDIT_DATA) cannot be safely cast to Data?.
savedInstanceState.getSerializable(STATE_DATA) cannot be safely cast to Data.
savedInstanceState.getSerializable(STATE_DATE_DF) cannot be safely cast to SimpleDateFormat.
savedInstanceState.getSerializable(STATE_TIME_DF) cannot be safely cast to SimpleDateFormat.
savedInstanceState.getSerializable(STATE_LOCALE) cannot be safely cast to Locale.
SimpleDateFormat.getInstance() cannot be safely cast to SimpleDateFormat.
intent?.getSerializableExtra(Countdown_text.EXTRA_DATA) cannot be safely cast to Data.
intent?.getSerializableExtra(TimeZone_activity.EXTRA_SELECTED_TZ) cannot be safely cast to TimeZone_disp.
intent?.getSerializableExtra(TimeZone_activity.EXTRA_SELECTED_TZ) cannot be safely cast to TimeZone_disp.
SimpleDateFormat.getDateInstance(SimpleDateFormat.SHORT) cannot be safely cast to SimpleDateFormat.
SimpleDateFormat.getTimeInstance(SimpleDateFormat.MEDIUM) cannot be safely cast to SimpleDateFormat.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function parse_date_and_time has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (size - distance) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: size - distance
Parentheses in (size - distance -1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: size - distance -1
Parentheses in (data.notify_start && start_action) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: data.notify_start && start_action

Parentheses in (data.notify_start && !data.notify_end && data.start_time == data.end_time && completion_action) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: data.notify_start && !data.notify_end && data.start_time == data.end_time && completion_action
Parentheses in (terminate && now_s > end_time) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: terminate && now_s > end_time
Parentheses in (InvalidParameterException("Unknown viewType: $viewType")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: InvalidParameterException("Unknown viewType: $viewType")

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class TimeZone_disp implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class Undo_event implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class Data implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.

smells.name: PreferToOverPairSyntax
smells.description: Pair was created using the Pair constructor, using the to syntax is preferred.

instances.message: Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `night_mode to theme`

Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `PendingIntent.getBroadcast(context, 0, start_intent, PendingIntent.FLAG_CANCEL_CURRENT) to PendingIntent.getBroadcast(context, 0, complete_intent, PendingIntent.FLAG_CANCEL_CURRENT)`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `undo_stack to redo_stack`

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.app.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
kotlin.math.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: ForbiddenComment
smells.description: Flags a forbidden comment. Defaults values are TODO:, FIXME: or STOPSHIP:

instances.message: This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.
This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.
